DeSalle is waiting.
🃏 June 18th – September 17th 🗡️

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-elder-scrolls-online/

The Worm Cult has returned to threaten the island paradise of Solstice in the Seasons of the Worm Cult Part 1. Venture into a new zone, never-before-seen in the Elder Scrolls, and discover new stories, allies, and dangers as you uncover the dread plans of the resurgent Worm Cult in a sequel saga 10 years in the making. The Seasons of the Worm Cult Part 1 is now live on PlayStation consoles.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: The Elder Scrolls Online - Seasons of the Worm Cult Part 1 Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/riders-republic/

Summer’s heating up in Riders Republic! Starting June 18, Season 15 kicks off with two brand-new ways to explore the Republic: The Pockett Plane and The Pockett Hovercraft. Get ready to soar and slide into the wildest season yet!

Play Riders Republic with Ubisoft+ Classics, available as a standalone subscription, and included for PlayStation Plus Premium and PlayStation Plus Extra members.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #ridersrepublic
title: Riders Republic - Season 15 Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/rocket-league/

Celebrate a decade of soccar glory in Rocket League Season 19, starting June 18 at 9 AM PT! Hit the pitch in the 10th Anniversary variant of the revered DFH Stadium. Go up the Tiers of a Rocket Pass featuring two Rocket League-original cars. Oh, and this Season features a Limited-Time Event starting day one: adidas FC Clash.

Unlike past Seasons, Rocket League Season 19 will be split across three parts so you know we’re playing in the big leagues.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4games #ps4 #rocketleague
title: Rocket League - Celebrate 10 Years of Aerials and Epic Saves in Season 19 | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/fortnite-festival/

Sabrina’s leaving the door open for the next Fortnite Festival Icon… Bruno Mars! This GRAMMY-winning megastar is expanding his record-breaking world tour with a stop in Fortnite. The World Tour Bundle is available in the Shop now, featuring:

Bruno-San Outfit: Take it 'round the world.
Bruno's Collection Back Bling: A perfect mix of retro and new.
Floating Notes Contrail: Drift on beats from Mars.
Bonde do Brunão Emote: Things are looking up!
Bonde do Brunão Jam Track: A souvenir from Brazil.
Key Charm Keytar: A real collector’s item.
Worldwide Bass: Make ‘em hear you everywhere.

And this is not a dream — the Season 9 Music Pass features the Die With A Smile Bruno Outfit based on the music video for “Die With A Smile”!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #fortnite #brunomars
title: Fortnite - Bruno Mars Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
🎒 Grab your backpack, 🗺️ find your map, and 📣 tell your kids. Dora: Rainforest Rescue is coming to PS5 and PS4 consoles on October 24th 🎮 🌳! 

✨ Your child will go on an interactive adventure with their amigos, Dora and Boots, playing in solo or local co-op mode. 
✨ Watch your kid laugh, dance and complete challenges with Ale, Tico, Isa, Benny, and Big Red Chicken. 
✨ They will discover secret paths in the rainforest to unlock new areas and skills, collect items and earn crystals.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #doratheexplorer
title: Dora Rainforest Rescue - Announce Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP7076-PPSA07906_00-STILLWAKES00DEEP

Still Wakes the Deep: Siren’s Rest is a story expansion to the 3-time BAFTA award-winning narrative horror game Still Wakes the Deep.

It’s 1986. Over a decade has passed since the Beira D incident. A specialist saturation dive team with a forensic focus descends into the North Sea to uncover the truth about what happened to the oil rig that sank without a trace. You want answers, but something down there wants you.

Submerge yourself in the latest first-person narrative adventure from The Chinese Room, creator of critically acclaimed games such as Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs, Everybody’s Gone to the Rapture, and Dear Esther.

Still Wakes the Deep: Siren’s Rest is out now on PlayStation 5.

#ps5 #ps5games

Rated Mature
title: Still Wakes the Deep - Siren's Rest Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
